definition: to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to die/to shoot dead/to reject/to fall forward/(suffix) to death
to collapse/variant of 斃|毙[bi4]/variant of 獙[bi4]

sentences.english: Compassion rose up in my heart when I saw the beggar drop dead in the street.
sentences.chinese: 当我看到这个乞丐倒毙街头时，怜悯之心油然而生。

sentences.english: The bullet went through his head, and he fell dead on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 子弹穿过他的脑袋，他当场倒毙。

sentences.english: The victim was found lying dead on the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 发现被害人倒毙于河岸。

sentences.english: Hit on the head, the enemy officer dropped dead instantly.
sentences.chinese: 那个敌军官因头部中弹当即倒毙。

definition: to meet violent death/to get killed
to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
to have only a breath of life (idiom)
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
